content: **knitted half long socks with rib in drops fiesta size 35 - 43** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fs-001 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** 35/37-38/40-41/43 foot length 22-24-26 cm leg height down to heel approx 16-17-18 cm **yarn** drops fiesta from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-150 g colour 17 sunshine **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
